block.p: Sara Catherine Golier, a daughter of Sue W. Golier and Robert T. Golier of Pittsburgh, was married yesterday to Douglas Jonathan Schneider, a son of Carol E. Schneider and Dr. William J. Schneider, both of Manhattan. Kenneth E. Keskinen, a justice of the peace, performed the ceremony at the Cream Hill Association, a club in West Cornwall, Conn.
The couple, both 28, graduated from the University of Vermont.

Sara Catherine Golier, a daughter of Sue W. Golier and Robert T. Golier of Pittsburgh, was married yesterday to Douglas Jonathan Schneider, a son of Carol E. Schneider and Dr. William J. Schneider, both of Manhattan. Kenneth E. Keskinen, a justice of the peace, performed the ceremony at the Cream Hill Association, a club in West Cornwall, Conn.
The couple, both 28, graduated from the University of Vermont.

Mrs. Schneider is a senior account executive at PR 21, a public relations firm in Manhattan. Her parents own and operate KSM Energy, a natural gas production company in Pittsburgh. Her mother is also a bridge tutor and an accountant in Pittsburgh.

Mr. Schneider is a research manager at Getty Images, a photograph archiving and licensing company in Manhattan. His mother is the vice president, executive director for publicity and associate publisher of the trade group at Random House in Manhattan. His father is the director of health services at J. P. Morgan & Company in Manhattan and an associate clinical professor of medicine and epidemiology at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine of Yeshiva University in the Bronx. The bridegroom is a stepson of Joan Schneider.
